Token.Abstract: This class is responsible for evaluating MBML expressions.
Evaluates the given expression in the string context.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a string.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the string context.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an MBExpressionError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs during evaluation, errPtr will be updated to point to an MBExpressionError instance describing the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a string.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the string context.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

Parameter.Name: def
Parameter.Abstract: A default return value to use if the method would otherwise return nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a string.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the string context.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

Parameter.Name: space
Parameter.Abstract: The MBVariableSpace instance to use for evaluating the expression. This allows the use of variable spaces other than the instance associated with the active MBEnvironment. Must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: def
Parameter.Abstract: A default return value to use if the method would otherwise return nil.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an MBExpressionError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs during evaluation, errPtr will be updated to point to an MBExpressionError instance describing the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a string.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the object context with string interpolation.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as an object with string interpolation.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the object context with string interpolation.

Parameter.Name: expr

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an MBExpressionError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs during evaluation, errPtr will be updated to point to an MBExpressionError instance describing the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as an object with string interpolation.

Parameter.Abstract: The MBVariableSpace instance to use for evaluating the expression. This allows the use of variable spaces other than the instance associated with the active MBEnvironment. Must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: def
Parameter.Abstract: A default return value to use if the method would otherwise return nil.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an MBExpressionError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs during evaluation, errPtr will be updated to point to an MBExpressionError instance describing the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as an object with string interpolation.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the object context without using string interpolation.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as an array of objects.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the numeric context, coercing the result into a number if necessary (and possible).

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a numeric expression.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the numeric context, coercing the result into a number if necessary (and possible).

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an MBExpressionError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs during evaluation, errPtr will be updated to point to an MBExpressionError instance describing the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a numeric expression.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the boolean context.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a boolean expression.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an MBExpressionError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs during evaluation, errPtr will be updated to point to an MBExpressionError instance describing the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a boolean expression.

Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

Parameter.Abstract: A default return value to use if the method would otherwise return nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a boolean expression.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the given expression in the boolean context.

Parameter.Name: expr
Parameter.Abstract: The expression to evaluate.

Parameter.Name: space
Parameter.Abstract: The MBVariableSpace instance to use for evaluating the expression. This allows the use of variable spaces other than the instance associated with the active MBEnvironment. Must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: def
Parameter.Abstract: A default return value to use if the method would otherwise return nil.

Parameter.Name: errPtr
Parameter.Abstract: An optional pointer to a memory location for storing an MBExpressionError instance. If this parameter is non-nil and an error occurs during evaluation, errPtr will be updated to point to an MBExpressionError instance describing the error.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the expression expr as a boolean expression.

Token.Abstract: Exposes the mechanism the expression evaluator uses for coercing arbitrary object values into booleans.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The object to interpret as a boolean

ReturnValue.Abstract: The boolean representation of val

Token.Abstract: Exposes the mechanism the expression evaluator uses for representing boolean values as strings.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The boolean value

ReturnValue.Abstract: The string representation of val; either kMBMLBooleanStringTrue or kMBMLBooleanStringFalse.

Token.Abstract: Exposes the mechanism the expression evaluator uses for coercing arbitrary object values into numbers.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The object to interpret as a number

ReturnValue.Abstract: If val can be interpreted as a number, the return value is an NSDecimalNumber containing that number. If val cannot be interpreted as a number, or if the resulting number is equal to [NSNumber notANumber], nil` will be returned.

Token.Abstract: Exposes the mechanism the expression evaluator uses for determining if two objects have equal values.

Parameter.Name: lValue
Parameter.Abstract: The left value of the comparison

Parameter.Name: rValue
Parameter.Abstract: The right value of the comparison

ReturnValue.Abstract: The return value of [lValue isEqual:rValue] if lValue and rValue are of the same type. Otherwise, falls back on [MBExpression compareLeftValue:lValue againstRightValue:rValue].

Token.Abstract: Exposes the mechanism the expression evaluator uses to determine the relative order of two object values.

Parameter.Name: lValue
Parameter.Abstract: The left value of the comparison

Parameter.Name: rValue
Parameter.Abstract: The right value of the comparison
